avalancheActivity.comment: A size 2 avalanche fell in Eldborgargil in Bláfjöll on the 26.3. during E winds with snowdrift. Hikers also triggered two smaller slabs in the same area. Small avalanches are widely seen where snow has drifted.
avalancheActivity.highlights: A lot of snow has has been loaded in W-aspects the last days. Unstable wind slabs and cornices are widespread. Natural avalanches have been released on this layer of drift snow and avalanches can easily be triggered by skiers or hikers in the area.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Wind slabs have formed widely in W aspects after E snowfall last week and ongoing E winds last days. A lot of snow has drifted and formed thick slabs that can easily be triggered by skiers or hikers. Older snowpack is widely frozen and stiff but faceting was discovered in a weak layer in snowpits on the 26th of March. High load is required in order to trigger an avalanche on this layer.

travelAdvisory.comment: Heavy snowdrift in strong NE-winds many places the last days and alot of snow added at higher elevations in the Eastfjords and invalley in the northern part. The avalanche forcast for Eastfjords is now red. Above Flateyri four avalanches were detected on Saturday in the NE-winds and in the north slabs were released by skiers in S and SW-faces in Dalsmynni and Kaldbakur above Grenivík. On Easterday an avalanches blocked the main road in Ljósavatnsskarð. People traveling in the mountains should practice caution and avoid steep hills and wind slabs.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack is currently unstable in all regions due to ongoing snowdrift in NE-winds. Weak layers have been detected in the snowpack widely and slabs have released

weatherForecast.highlights: Fremur hæg NA-læg átt og úrkomulítið fram á miðvikud. Vaxandi dægursveifla í hitastigi og getur frostmarkshæð því náð hátt til fjalla á daginn.

avalancheActivity.comment: Three avalanhces occurred above Flateyri on Saturday and one on Friday. Many avalanches occurred after N-NE blizzard more than a week ago.
avalancheActivity.highlights: A lot of snow has drifted into SE - NW aspects but the snowpack is unstable in all aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has drifted and formed thick layered wind slabs. NE winds have been in the area with snowfall and drifting snow. A weak layer has been found betweed wind slabs. Older snow is under the wind slabs and is widely stable after freeze-thaw cycles. People should avoid steep terrain while the snowpack is adjusting.

travelAdvisory.comment: Heavy snowdrift in strong NE-winds many places the last days and alot of snow added at higher elevations in the Eastfjords and invalley in the northern part. The avalanche forcast for Eastfjords is now red. Above Flateyri four avalanches were detected on Saturday in the NE-winds and in the north slabs were released by skiers in S and SW-faces in Dalsmynni and Kaldbakur above Grenivík. On Easterday an avalanches blocked the main road in Ljósavatnsskarð. People traveling in the mountains should practice caution and avoid steep hills and wind slabs.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack is currently unstable in all regions due to ongoing snowdrift in NE-winds. Weak layers have been detected in the snowpack widely and slabs have released

weatherForecast.highlights: NA 10-15 m/s og él en dregur úr vindi og úrkomu á þriðjudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A large avalanche in Héðinsfjörður was remotely trigger by snowmobiles on March 26th. Many slabs released in strong N-winds a week ago, some of them were big
avalancheActivity.highlights: A lot of new snow inland in strong NE-winds last days, windslabs in most aspects. Total Blizzard for a while on Eastern day, strong NNE-wind with heavy precip for a while and great snowdrift

snowpackStructure.highlights: A lot of new snow in the mountains after northerly blizzard a week ago resulting in many slab avalanches some were quite big. Total Blizzard for a while on Eastern day, strong NNE-wind with heavy precip for a while and great snowdrift. Snowpit (Illviðrishnjúkur 26.03) showed new snow and windslab on old crust. Bond between new and old snow was rather weak with CT12. Two other snowpits from last few days showed a rather weak bond between windslab and old snow, with faceted snow and depth hoar between layers.

travelAdvisory.comment: Heavy snowdrift in strong NE-winds many places the last days and alot of snow added at higher elevations in the Eastfjords and invalley in the northern part. The avalanche forcast for Eastfjords is now red. Above Flateyri four avalanches were detected on Saturday in the NE-winds and in the north slabs were released by skiers in S and SW-faces in Dalsmynni and Kaldbakur above Grenivík. On Easterday an avalanches blocked the main road in Ljósavatnsskarð. People traveling in the mountains should practice caution and avoid steep hills and wind slabs.

weatherForecast.highlights: Minnkandi NA-átt og él á mánud. hægari A-lægari átt og úrkomulítið á þriðjud.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few small avalanches occurred this week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow is in the area. Layered windslabs are present on most aspects, especially on SW-erly ones, and are very unstable in places.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow is in the area. Strong NE-winds have been ongoing and snow has accumulated on the lee side of mountains and in gullies and lows. New wind slabs have most likely formed, especially on SW-aspects. The snowpack is layered and snowpits have shown very weak layers. A weak layer has been found deep in the old snow at high elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Heavy snowdrift in strong NE-winds many places the last days and alot of snow added at higher elevations in the Eastfjords and invalley in the northern part. The avalanche forcast for Eastfjords is now red. Above Flateyri four avalanches were detected on Saturday in the NE-winds and in the north slabs were released by skiers in S and SW-faces in Dalsmynni and Kaldbakur above Grenivík. On Easterday an avalanches blocked the main road in Ljósavatnsskarð. People traveling in the mountains should practice caution and avoid steep hills and wind slabs.

weatherForecast.highlights: N/NA-áttir, víða 8-13 m/s, og snjókoma eða él. Dregur úr vindi og úrkomu á þriðjudag.
